body.name: Brushee - The Evolution of Oral Care | 3-in-1 Tool (Pre-Pasted Mini-Brush + Floss + Pick) | Individually Wrapped | Disposable | Prepasted Travel Toothbrushes | Small Adult Toothbrush - (24-Pack)

features: PORTABLE BRUSH: Brushee is a pocket-sized toothbrush with toothpaste in the bristles, a toothpick, and floss, specifically designed to provide quick and easy oral care on the go. Use it before a meeting, on a plane, with Invisalign, in the office, and after meals.

HIGH-QUALITY CONSTRUCTION: The bristles of this mini-brush are made of high-quality nylon, and are coated with toothpaste specially engineered to produce minimal foam. As such, there’s no need to rinse after brushing.

CLEAN TEETH: Brushee's combination of multiple flossing options helps remove food particles from those hard-to-reach areas, while the toothpaste in the bristles provides you with a clean and healthy smile.

FRESH BREATH: You’ll never have to worry about getting caught with bad breath again. Easily assisting in eliminating bad breath caused by food and beverages consumed during the day, Brushee will keep your breath fresh 24/7.

QUICK RESULTS: Simply brush your teeth with or without water for clean teeth and fresh breath. As you brush, the paste releases to aid in removing surface stains and in less than sixty seconds, the job is done.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: What is Brushee? Brushee is a pocket-sized toothbrush with toothpaste in the bristles, a toothpick inside, and a floss at the end, for quick & easy oral care on-the-go. How does Brushee work? The Brushee has toothpaste in the bristles, a pick, and a floss, to aid in providing a better and beautiful smile, while also removing food particles from between your teeth. As you brush, the paste releases to aid in removing surface stains. Does this have gelatin? Absolutely not! Is there fluoride in toothpaste? Not at all. There is no fluoride in our paste. What are the ingredients of the toothpaste? Glycerin, Sorbitol, Sodium Carboxy Methyl Cellulose, Sodium Saccharin, Sodium Benzoate, Water, Titanium Dioxide, Silicon Dioxide, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Calcium Hydrogen Phosphate, Calcium Carbonate, Flavor

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These are very nice. They are very portable of course. They make a good amount of foam. Unlike some of the others out there, there's not just a little bead that is hard and falls off. Good minty flavor

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best carry toothbrush
reviews.reviewText: It is the perfect toothbrush, I carry this with me to work or wherever I go. Easy to use and it does its job , then it throw away 😊 clean and effective, worth the price, and weighs nothing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars The floss unfortunately breaks too easily
reviews.reviewText: I love this product. Whomever created it was a genius. They are all individually packed, unlike other products where you have to keep them inside their bags (thereby creating bulk in your purse).I find that the paste actually tastes good, and once you have placed it in your mouth, it starts performing pretty quickly, although I prefer to wet it a bit before using, as it makes it a bit easier.The floss actually comes attached, and once you remove it, you find the pick. None of the other products have this!! With other products, you need one bag of toothbrushes, and one bag of floss. The only problem is that the floss breaks easily.Customer service is great, I complained about this to them, and they were very professional and are working on improving this feature.Unfortunately, it doesn't have a compartment for mouthwash as well.... that would make this the perfect product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Individually wrapped . It’s a neccessity , very handy esp if you are going to travel , camping or take a long drive. Don’t take to much space in your bag or purse . It fit inside your wallet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: 1st the bristles are stiff with paste. Make sure you have some water to rinse your mouth out with. The part that comes out, on the end, has a very strong pointy projectile that can draw blood. I flatten it down using my teeth before using. The floss part is adequate.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for travel, the car, purse, backpack, etc
reviews.reviewText: Sometimes you need more than floss. And usually you arent around your toothbrush when you do. I've put some of these absolutely everywhere. I'm going on a huge trip, and I've stuffed my luggage with these. Nothing like needing to brush your teeth on the plane and not being able to (or wanting to) get your toothbrush out.Toothpaste amount is just right, and foams only a little. Was worried I'd feel like I needed to spit the toothpaste out if I was in a place where I didn't have access to a sink... but it doesn't foam too much, so you don't really have to. Using them dry isn't a problem either... they quickly soften and absorb from your saliva.The floss isn't flimsy, and is thick enough to really get all the stuck food. The pick is super sharp and sturdy... better than an actual toothpick even! You will have a very clean mouth after using it.Only downside is it tastes like minty plastic after you're done.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Additional to first review. After trying the product again, I have had great luck. There very possibly was a couple defects in a batch. Bound to happen in high production. Will definitely buy again.The tooth paste and flavor are tremendous. The quality of the apparatus is excellent with the exception of the floss. 2-3 teeth in and the floss comes out. I’ve used tons of different types of floss sticks and this floss portion was terrible. I’ll try again hoping it was a bad batch.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 29, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Convenient. Gets the job done. Could be improved
reviews.reviewText: I’m a big fan of mini toothbrushes that can be used on the go (without water). I’ve been using Colgate Wisps for years; and while they’re great for freshening up after a meal/coffee, I was looking for a mini brush that would allow me to brush my teeth more thoroughly on the go - something with traditional bristles and toothpaste. These brushes really fit the bill of what I was looking for.Here is what I really like about this product:- Traditional bristled brush - cleans teeth thoroughly- Pre-pasted- Individually packaged - can be thrown in a pocket/purse/backpack (won’t end up covered in lint or whatever else).- Built-in toothpick and flossing tool - it really is a great design, extremely functional.Here is what could be improved:- Toothpaste flavor- it didn’t taste awful, just kinda bitter/bland (no minty taste). The brushing experience would be more pleasant with a fresh minty toothpaste (different flavor options would be awesome).*note: I’ve only purchased these brushes once: it’s possible the bitter taste was an anomaly.- Faulty toothpicks - about 1 in 4 toothpicks breaks when trying to pull the ends of the brush apart (no matter how gentle I am).- Toothpaste foaminess (yes, foaminess is a word - who knew?) - the toothpaste foams up A LOT when brushing. Whether you see this as a positive or negative, likely depends on how you plan to use these brushes. For people like myself who want a quick brush on the go, all that foam is inconvenient because it requires you to spit multiple times (something that is hard to do when driving - which I found out the first time I used one of these brushes).*My solution to the foaminess issue: if I’m in a situation where spitting isn’t ideal, I remove much of the dried paste before brushing (about 2/3). It still foams up enough to clean to my teeth, but not so much that it would be gross to swallow.All in all, I really like this product. The design is perfect. With a couple small improvements to the execution the product could be even better!

reviews.reviewTitle: They fit in my purse perfectly 5
reviews.reviewText: They fit in my purse perfectly

The floss part breaks with the first use. The brush is great once you get past the terrible dried old toothpaste taste. I will not be buying these again. Will spend the extra money for the name brand once
